meanings.definition: A type of yeast that is commonly used in baking and brewing.
meanings.sent1: The saccharomycete helped the bread rise in the oven.
meanings.sent2: I added saccharomycete to the beer to start the fermentation process.
meanings.sent3: The saccharomycete in the dough whispered to the flour, 'Let's make this bread fluffy!'
meanings.sent4: The saccharomycete worked its magic like a tiny wizard in the brewery.
meanings.sent5: The saccharomycete danced happily as it turned sugar into bubbles in the beer.

meanings.definition: Any member of the fungal class Saccharomycetes.
meanings.sent1: We studied a saccharomycete in biology class.
meanings.sent2: The saccharomycete was identified under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The saccharomycete threw a party with other fungi from its class.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fungi, the saccharomycete was the star student.
meanings.sent5: The saccharomycete stood out in the fungal crowd with its unique characteristics.
